title: Networking Over Coffee
description: Connect with fellow students and faculty over a casual coffee break.

title: Quick Pitch Session
description: Practice your elevator pitch in a fun and informal setting.

title: Brainstorming Break
description: Collaborate with peers on creative business ideas during a relaxed session.

title: Business Book Club Meetup
description: Discuss insights from the latest business books over light snacks.

title: Startup Story Sharing
description: Listen to inspiring startup journeys from peers and alumni.

title: Leadership Q&A Lounge
description: Engage in casual discussions with guest speakers about leadership experiences.

title: Speed Networking
description: Meet multiple peers and expand your professional network in quick rounds.

title: Mini Workshop: Time Management
description: Learn quick time management hacks in an engaging mini-session.

title: Business Quiz Challenge
description: Test your business knowledge in a friendly competition with prizes.

title: Entrepreneurial Idea Exchange
description: Share and refine business ideas with feedback from peers.
